title: [K-12] Computer-Based Medical Education Design: Enhancing Patient and Professional Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic medical terminology and possession of educational experience
context.additional_context: Participants have little or no prior experience in designing medical professional education and possess only basic proficiency in using computer-based educational tools.

learning_goals: Learners can design one patient education content piece using CBT (educational software) based on medical scenarios
Learners can develop interactive quiz modules grounded in adult learning principles
Learners can produce multimedia patient education materials (videos/infographics) compatible with mobile devices and PCs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
